captions.text:
- You got this, you
got this, you got this!

- OK we're going up, we're
going up, we're going up.
- Come on, come on, come on, come on!
- It's like if Apple created a glue gun.
- Kind of, but it's kind of clunky.
- You're right.
- I don't wanna complain.
- It's like if Samsung created it.

- Is this for children? It
seems a little dangerous.
- So, what are we gonna draw?
We're gonna do glasses?
- Let's try glasses to start.

- OK, so we just hit the
button and then it'll go?
- What is the-- there's different lines.
What does that mean?
Alright, let's just do this.

- It's really loud and
nothing's happening yet.

Anything happening?
- [Male in Gray] Not yet.

Oh there you go, you just
gotta give it a little nudge.
- I don't like the way this smells.

It smells pretty harmful for
children and elderly people.
- How do I make it turn?
- I think with your hand.
- I'm still not getting anything.

- There we go. I'm getting
it. I'm getting it.

- [Man in Black] What? Oh
there we go, there we go.

I think we should note
that both of us have
made our living as illustrators.

Full-time illustrators.
- Yeah.

- And so far, this is
what I've come up with.
- And this is what I have.

- This seems like something
kids would do in camp

and the counselor would go
talk to their girlfriend
or boyfriend at this time.

- I'm going to try the
higher speed setting.

- Oh, I've been doing the
high speed the whole time.
- Really? I've been doing the slower.
- I'm John McClane-ing this shit.
- That changes everything.

- I have the instinct to like,
"Oh, I need to draw on paper"

but like I don't have to.
- [Woman in Gray] Yeah, no.

- I could draw up here.
I'm drawing right now.
- Oh!
- Oh wait, yours is way better than mine!

- Gosh those are like unbreakable
glasses, glasses of steel.

They even have an already
nerdy bandaid patch.
- I know!
- Here are my glasses.

- Okay.
- These are for you.
- There you go, they're very fragile.
- So these are Quinta's glasses.
They are hearts, obviously.

- Here you go.
- OK, I put this--
- Oh, yours is so cool!

- I put a fake nose on
it, like for disguises.
- Right?

- So, I don't think it's a
question of if we look cool.

I think it's more like
how cool do we look?

- Yeah.
- [Man in Black] Pretty cool.
- Although I gotta tell you, design-wise,
yours aren't really staying on my face.
- See, I was afraid of that.
- Oh no! Oh no!

- Yay!
- So gorgeous.
- Yay, you look gorgeous!
- Thank you.

- They're built for water sports,
dreaming, falling in love,
seeing, and also just being awesome.
- I definitely see myself falling in love
while wearing these glasses.
- Now I'm going to draw a penis.

- Cause you know that's the
first thing they drew with it.
- Oh, yeah, oh yeah.

- They were like "Oh we're gonna
draw some dicks with this."
- I'm kinda loving this thing.
